page.title: 03THE CANAL
page.content: modified to become private or hire boats and are mainly used for holidays and recreation. The boats were originally made of wood sealed with tar, but now they are made of steel and some of the smaller ones are made of fibre glass. These new boats are built in the old style and most of them have the same kind of decorations of roses and castles on the door and have brightly coloured exteriors. The long boats have a galley where you do your cooking, usually by Calor Gas, a cabin, or cabins, where you can sleep, a saloon where you eat your meals, a toilet, and some boats have showers. There is usually a big water tank fitted into the boat. There are different sizes of narrow boat, ranging from 42ft long to 54ft long and will sleep from 4 to 8 people. To have a boat built for yourself will
